data = np.random.multivariate_normal([0, 0, 1], [[1, 0.5, 0.2], [0.5, 1, 
    0.3], [0.2, 0.3, 1.0]], size=100000)
parameters = ['x', 'y', 'z']
c = ChainConsumer()
c.add_chain(data, parameters=parameters, name='chain1')
p, cor = c.analysis.get_correlations(chain='chain1', parameters=['y', 'z', 'x']
    )
assert p[0] == 'y'
assert p[1] == 'z'
assert p[2] == 'x'
assert np.isclose(cor[0, 0], 1, atol=0.01)
assert np.isclose(cor[1, 1], 1, atol=0.01)
assert np.isclose(cor[2, 2], 1, atol=0.01)
assert cor.shape == (3, 3)
assert np.abs(cor[0, 1] - 0.3) < 0.01
assert np.abs(cor[0, 2] - 0.5) < 0.01
assert np.abs(cor[1, 2] - 0.2) < 0.01
